S

Scooter - Class in de.teamshrug.scooterms
The scooter class can be used by a customer as a vehicle until the battery is empty, the customer pays a fixed price for every minute of travel.
Scooter(Area, MaintenanceDepartment) - Constructor for class de.teamshrug.scooterms.Scooter
 
scootercapacity - Variable in class de.teamshrug.scooterms.MaintenanceDepartment
 
scootercount - Variable in class de.teamshrug.scooterms.ScooterHotspot
 
ScooterHotspot - Class in de.teamshrug.scooterms
there are several ScooterHotspots in one area, each hotspot has a name and a limited capacity for scooters, a ScooterHunter can replace empty scooters with reloaded ones
ScooterHotspot(String, Coordinate, Area, int) - Constructor for class de.teamshrug.scooterms.ScooterHotspot
 
scooterhotspotlist - Static variable in class de.teamshrug.scooterms.ScooterHotspot
 
ScooterHunter - Class in de.teamshrug.scooterms
Can do what a Customer can do, but is able to see Scooters with low battery and recharge them to top up the account balance
ScooterHunter(String, Area) - Constructor for class de.teamshrug.scooterms.ScooterHunter
 
scooterlist - Static variable in class de.teamshrug.scooterms.Scooter

Status - Enum in de.teamshrug.scooterms
The enum Status consists of these types: ready, lowonbattery, inuse, charging, damaged, maintenance.
